Body.Build: Glass front, glass back, aluminum frame
Body.SIM: Single SIM (Nano-SIM) or Hybrid Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)

Platform.OS: Android 10, EMUI 10, no Google Play Services
Platform.CPU: Octa-core (2x2.86 GHz Cortex-A76 & 2x2.09 GHz Cortex-A76 & 4x1.86 GHz Cortex-A55)

Memory.Card slot: NM (Nano Memory), up to 256GB (uses shared SIM slot)

Main Camera.Triple:
40 MP, f/1.8, 27mm (wide), 1/1.54", PDAF, Laser AF
8 MP, f/2.4, 80mm (telephoto), 1/4.0", PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
16 MP, f/2.2, 17mm (ultrawide)
Main Camera.Features: Leica optics, dual-LED dual-tone flash, panorama, HDR

Comms.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, DLNA, Wi-Fi Direct

Features.Sensors: Face ID, fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, barometer, compass

Misc.Colors: Black, Space Silver, Cosmic Purple, Emerald Green
